name: Bane of Brain V2
description:
Controls - wasd or arrow keys to move, click to shoot.

You are a brain in a jar, and you must fight the wizards that surround you.

The original version was made for Paint Jam but long this time 2021 a few months ago. All images were made in MS Paint except the cover image. Made in collaboration with my friends Tristan, Keegan, and Marty.
